templates.name: fullPlayerDisplay
templates.code:
[i9s_career_summary pid="{@pid}"] [pods name="player" slug="{@pid}"]{@playerintro}[/pods] [pods name="player" template="tblPlayerInfo" slug="{@pid}"]

 

Batting Projections

[i9s_batting_table pid="{@pid}"]

 

Pitching Projections

[i9s_pitching_table pid="{@pid}"]

templates.name: tblPlayerInfo
templates.code:
[before][/before] [after]
Name{@first_name} {@last_name}[if nickname] ({@nickname})[/if]
ID / Status{@pid} / {@i9s_level}
Pos{@pos}
DOB / i9s Career[if dob]{@dob}[else]{@yob}[/if] / {@yrdebut} - {@yrfinal}
Birthplace[if birth_city]{@birth_city}, [/if][if birth_state]{@birth_state} [/if]({@birth_nation})
Height / Weight{@height} / {@weight}
B / T{@b} / {@t}
[/after]

templates.name: tblPlayerYears_B
templates.code:
[before][/before] [if ab] [/if] [after]
YearABH2B3BHRBBSOSBCSBAOBPSLGOPS
{@yr} {@ab} {@h} {@2b} {@3b} {@hr} {@bb} {@so} {@sb} {@cs} {:i9s_display_ba({@h},{@ab}):} {:i9s_display_obp({@h},{@bb},{@ab}):} {:i9s_display_slg({@h},{@2b},{@3b},{@hr},{@ab}):} {:i9s_display_ops({@h},{@bb},{@ab},{@2b},{@3b},{@hr}):}
[/after]

templates.name: tblPlayerYears_P
templates.code:
[before][/before] [if g] [/if] [after]
YearGGSIPHAWKHRAeDeTeHBPBB/9H/9K/9ERAWHIP
{@yr}{@g}{@gs}{@ip}{@ha}{@w}{@k}{@hra}{@ed}{@et}{@ehbp}{@bb_9}{@h_9}{@k_9}{@era}{@whip}
[/after]
